text: Antti Kalevi Hyry (20 October 1931 - 4 June 2016Författaren Antti Hyry är död ) was a Finnish writer. He won the Eino Leino Prize in 2005. For his 2009 book Uuni (Oven), Hyry won the Finlandia Prize, Finland's premier prize for literature. Hyry was born in Kuivaniemi. He is married to Maija Hyry. He died in Espoo, aged 84. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Finnish writers
title: Antti Hyry
